txt.en: Bury the bodies of slain warriors in Arandor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Slain warriors can be found in Arandor.\n\nYou should bury the bodies of any slain warriors you come across.

'The march from DÃ­ngarth to Adambel has become a sad one, and my eyes well up just to think on't. The bodies of our friends and fellow soldiers are strewn about the battlefields, for none have taken the time to give them a proper burial. What haste can there be when our siege has lasted for so long, and shows no sign of stopping? \n\n'We must honour them, and show that they are remembered, and died not in vain. The war has taken its toll, yet we keep fighting! Let us give them proper burials. We must take the time for that, at least, or we are no better than the Orcs.'
The soldier Calion wants to give those who sacrificed their lives in battle a proper burial.
Buried many slain warriors in Arandor.
The bodies of the slain will be given a proper burial, and you know that this small toil will have a great effect upon the morale of the soldiers who still live and fight for the Great Alliance.
